page.title: 14LAW AND ORDER.
page.content: Living in a rural area we are lucky to see a policeman once a month! But unlike towns and cities we see very few crimes,although there are quite a few road accidents due to narrow roads,bad bends and crossroads. Our block comes under the beat of P.C. Baldwin who is stationed at Weston-Under-Penyard.He works for the West Mercia Constabulary which covers Herefordshire,Worcestershire and Shropshire;his headquarters being in Worcester. He patrols his beat in Fiesta car which is unaltered apart from a blue light and{POLICE STOP}signs. The nearest court is at Ross.There are a few minor offences,but there are few serious crimes
